name: Five Mile Pond (anonymousclub)
description:
This is the first draft of our game, Five Mile Pond! It is a narrative-based adventure game where you are exploring Salem in 1692 during the height of the witch trials. You are there to observe and write about the witchcraft hysteria - but there seems to be something more out in the woods. 

Anonymous Club is a group of four friends who love to makes stuff together. This is just the first iteration of Five Mile Pond, so keep an eye out for future versions with polished gameplay and more adventure!
